DataElement.preferredName: Wechsler Memory Scale - Fourth Edition Visual Working Memory Index (WMS-IV) Score WMS-IV Scaled Score Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric representation of the score for the Visual Working Memory Index, Fourth Edition.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Wechsler Memory Scale - Fourth Edition Visual Working Memory Index (WMS-IV) Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The fourth version of the Wechsler Memory Scale that was published in 2009. It is a neuropsychological test designed to measure different memory functions in individuals ranging in age from 16 to 90 years._A subtest of the Wechsler Memory Scale, 4th Edition that assesses visual working and visual-spatial working memory using recognition memory and free recall formats._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity that represents the conversion of a raw score on a test to a common scale in the Wechsler Memory Scale - Fourth Edition.
